docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 22 -- Foreign ministers of the Western Hemisphere will convene Jan. 22 in Punta del Este, Uruguay, in an effort to deal with problems arising from Cuba's alliance with the Soviet bloc.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 22 -- Foreign ministers of the Western Hemisphere will convene Jan. 22 in Punta del Este, Uruguay, in an effort to deal with problems arising from Cuba's alliance with the Soviet bloc.
docs.abstract: foreign mins conf postponed to Jan 22 to allow more time for preparation

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 22 -- Wiley T. Buchanan Jr. today dismissed criticism of his daughter's coming-out party last night in the Pan American Union as "a tempest over nothing."'

docs.snippet: KEY WEST, Fla., Dec. 22 (AP) -- Premier Fidel Castro of Cuba said today that counter- revolutionaries sent by the United States had been captured in Cuba and had admitted they were trained at an American base.
docs.lead_paragraph: KEY WEST, Fla., Dec. 22 (AP) -- Premier Fidel Castro of Cuba said today that counter- revolutionaries sent by the United States had been captured in Cuba and had admitted they were trained at an American base.

docs.snippet: According to the original timetable laid down by Premier Khrushchev for settling the "German question," this was to have been the week of showdown on Berlin. Mr. Khrushchev announced last summer that the Soviet Union would sign a separate peace...
docs.lead_paragraph: According to the original timetable laid down by Premier Khrushchev for settling the "German question," this was to have been the week of showdown on Berlin. Mr. Khrushchev announced last summer that the Soviet Union would sign a separate peace treaty with the East Germans and hand over to them control of the Berlin access routes by the end of the year.

docs.snippet: PALM BEACH, Fla., Dec. 23 -- President Kennedy will hold a Christmas Eve conference here tomorrow with President Arturo Frondizi of Argentina on the threat to Western Hemisphere solidarity presented by Cuba's alliance with the Soviet bloc.
docs.lead_paragraph: PALM BEACH, Fla., Dec. 23 -- President Kennedy will hold a Christmas Eve conference here tomorrow with President Arturo Frondizi of Argentina on the threat to Western Hemisphere solidarity presented by Cuba's alliance with the Soviet bloc.

headline.main: KENNEDY TO SEE FRONDIZI TODAY; They Will Discuss Threat of Cuban Tie With Red Bloc

byline.original: By JOSEPH A. LOFTUS Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: Capt. Robert M. Slack of States Marine Lines received the Andrew Furuseth Medal last week for saving the life of a longshoreman in Montevideo, Uruguay, in June, 1959.
docs.lead_paragraph: Capt. Robert M. Slack of States Marine Lines received the Andrew Furuseth Medal last week for saving the life of a longshoreman in Montevideo, Uruguay, in June, 1959.

headline.main: CITED FOR SAVING LIFE; Moore-McCormack Captain Gets Furuseth Medal
